Package tv.morefun.flint

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Flint.ApplicationConnectionResult
    Interface to display current application connection status.
    Flint.FlintApi
    The entry point for interacting with a Flint device.
    Flint.MessageReceivedCallback
    Callback function when received messages from a Flint device
    FlintManager
    Flint Manager interface.
    FlintManager.ApiOptions
    Flint Api options
    FlintManager.ConnectionCallbacks
    Connection callback.
    PendingResult<R extends Result>
    This interface used for flint request wait and callback process.
    RemoteMediaPlayer.MediaChannelResult
    Used to present a result of media command which is sent to Flint device
    RemoteMediaPlayer.OnMetadataUpdatedListener
    The listener interface for tracking media meta data changes.
    RemoteMediaPlayer.OnStatusUpdatedListener
    The listener interface for tracking player status changes.
    Result
    Flint Result interface.
    ResultCallback<R extends Result>
    An interface for receiving a Result from a PendingResult as an asynchronous callback.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationMetadata
    Application meta data.
    ConnectionResult
    Flint connection result.
    Flint
    Which will be used by Flint application to do all Flint actions.
    Flint.FlintApi.FlintApiImpl
    Implementation of FlintApi interface
    Flint.FlintOptions
    Flint options Contained all Flint options, for example, application status listener, log flags.
    Flint.FlintOptions.Builder
    A builder to create an instance of Flint.FlintOptions to set API configuration parameters for Flint.
    Flint.Listener
    Interface which will be notified when Flint application's status is changed.
    FlintDevice
    Contain all info about a Flint device.
    FlintDevice.Builder
    This is used to create Flint device with some device info.
    FlintManager.Builder
    Helper class for FlintApi class
    FlintMediaControlIntent
    Flint media control intent.
    FlintStatusCodes
    All Flint status
    MediaInfo
    Contain all Media informations.
    MediaInfo.Builder
    MediaInfo builder, used to set all staffs of MediaInfo.
    MediaMetadata
    Media meta data.
    MediaStatus
    A class that holds status information about some media.
    RemoteMediaPlayer
    Class for controlling a media player application running on a receiver.
    Status
    Represents the results of work.
